Articles.Content:
today, at 2135utc begins the launch window for the next ariane 5 launch - with 2 commercial sats - one comm sat and one weather sat

will be streamed live on arianespace.tv

and the launch is successful...

edit:

the next launch is on the 9th - a proton launcher for ils

the next launch is on the 9th - a proton launcher for ils

the launch is at 1838utc... streamed on tsenki.com

edit: and here: http://ses5.imgondemand.com/

the launch was successful...

the next launch is soyuz-fg launcher with soyuz tma-05m spacecraft... it (she?) will carry malenchenko (rus), williams (usa) and hoshide (jpn) for the iss...

the launch is scheduled on the 15th
and successful soyuz launch with williams, hoshide and malenchenko
soyuz tma-05m successfully docked to the iss

the next launch is tomorrow (21st) at 0206utc...

the japanese launcher h-2b will launch kounotori-3 (aka htv-3) cargo supply spacecraft for the iss

the next launch is tomorrow (21st) at 0206utc...

the japanese launcher h-2b will launch kounotori-3 (aka htv-3) cargo supply spacecraft for the iss

and the launch was successful...

the next launch is tomorrow (22nd) at 0641utc - russian will launch soyuz fg launcher with fregat upper stage carrying several sats - one for russian govt, earth observation sat for belarus, technology demostrator for german dlr (german aerospace center) and some more...
